programme.title: Hitchhike To Murder / In The Care Of A Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E15, Police must wait nearly 30 years before advances in DNA technology give them the chance to convict the killer of a young hitchhiker, and Philadelphia police wage a 16-year hunt for the man who raped and killed a 10-year-old girl.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E03, When a church deacon is found shot to death it looks like police may have stumbled upon a multi-party murder plot. And, a wife remains a key suspect in her husband's murder case for six years, until she attempts to prove her own innocence.

programme.title: The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E04, In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E01, After 46 years, LA homicide detectives take a Lover's Lane bandit who also gunned down two police officers into custody. Then, DNA testing helps lead police in Florida to a suspected killer, however, the killer has an identical twin.

programme.title: She Never Came Home
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E03, The case of a gruesome stabbing death of a bullied teenager remains unsolved for 27 years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2004, Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.

programme.title: Killer in the Storm
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E01, In the heart of Cajun country, young mother Brenda DuPont is found murdered in her home in May 1988. The initial investigation sputters and turns cold, but her sister Linda vows to solve her murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E06, In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E23, The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: The Flaming Gorge Falls/Caught In The Mail
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E16, A man suspected of the cold case murder of his wife and son hatches a new plot to kill his mother and father; and detectives solve the 20-year-old murder of a teenager by tricking her killer into licking an envelope.

programme.title: Woman in the Woods
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E12, In August 1972, the body of Jody Loomis is found in the woods. 34 years later, the killer's DNA is recovered from Jody's old clothing but it isn't matched until 2018.

programme.title: In The Care Of A Killer/Deadly Lies
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E30, The suspicious death of 2-year-old Billy Blankenship is solved when police force his babysitter to re-enact the circumstances of his death. Then, a murder case is solved when the dead man's body is accidentally found by divers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E10, Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Missing in Altoona
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E03, When Sherry Leighty goes missing in 1999, her family is left wondering how a dedicated mother of three could vanish without a trace. A decade later, the cold case heats up when Sherry's sister launches a social media campaign.

programme.title: The Sunday Morning Slasher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E11, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E20, Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.
MST3K: Earth vs. The Spider, 19910914000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots get tips on public speaking from the short Speech: Using Your Voice and watch a spider devour a town in Earth vs the Spider (1958)

MST3K: Escape 2000, 19960302000000 +0000, A grunge punk fights an evil corporation enforcing an evacuation of the Bronx in Escape from the Bronx (1983). Mike and the Bots have "Men's Night" on the SOL and Dr. Forester tries to come up with a way to boost the show's ratings.

MST3K: Gamera, 19910608000000 +0000, A giant mutated turtle wakes from eons of slumber and attacks Japan in Gamera: The Giant Monster (1965). The Bots create their own beauty salon and are treated to a visit from Gamera himself.

MST3K: Hercules, 19930617000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots have a casual day on the SOL and endure another incoherent Hercules movie (Hercules (1958)).
MST3K: High School Big Shot, 19941210000000 +0000, The crew fights lapsing into a depression while watching the incredibly dour High School Big Shot in which a high school loser takes part in a heist

Pack of Lies, 19870426000000 +0000, A thriller about a middle class family which are suddenly thrown into a world of international intrigue. Stars Ellen Burstyn and Alan Bates.
Love on the Air, 20150926000000 +0000, Competing radio personalities in Chicago find common ground when they have to work together. Stars Alison Sweeney and Jonathan Scarfe.
How to Train Your Husband, 20180619000000 +0000, A marriage therapist attempts to fix her own marriage by focusing on how to change her husband. Stars Julie Gonzalo, Jonathan Chase.
Cooking with Love, 20180211000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Optimistic and cheerful TV producer, Kelly, doesn't have time for love.

programme.title: Finding Her Pink
programme.desc: The Motherhood, S01E01, Tasha poured everything into being a mom, but lost herself. With support from The Motherhood, Tasha learns to set boundaries, reclaim her space, and rediscover her confidence, ...

programme.title: Driven
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E02, Hallmark Original Series. The arrival of a man from Cassie's past may complicate her relationship.

programme.title: Out of the Past
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E03, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's old friend John attempts to unearth their shared college memories.

programme.title: The Trouble with Love
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E04, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie feels upset after Grace admits she's been spending more time with Sam.

programme.title: Surprise Me
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E05, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie is surprised with adventurous outings by both Sam and John.

programme.title: Deals Undone
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E08, Hallmark Original Series. Mick faces a failing business deal while Abby is subpoenaed.

programme.title: Exes Mark the Spot
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E09, Hallmark Original Series. Abby and Trace seem finally ready to move forward.

programme.title: Secrets, Lies and School Supplies
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E01, Hallmark Original Series. Trace and the O'Briens attempt to put their own challenges aside.

programme.title: Thirty Eight Minutes
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E04, The Stargate team must rush to save Major John Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) after he becomes lodged in the Stargate, with only 38 minutes until the gate automatically disengages, and Sheppard is expelled into space, where he will surely asphyxiate.

programme.title: Suspicion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E05, After several attacks by the Wraiths, Dr. Elizabeth Weir contemplates if there is a spy among the team, with all signs pointing to Teyla. Feeling betrayed by the team's suspicions, the Athosians move to a newly discovered land.

programme.title: Childhood's End
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E06, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan), Dr. Weir (Torri Higginson), and the rest of the team visit a new planet, M7G-677, where no one is older than 24 thanks to a ritual suicide that the citizens believe is keeping the Wraith at bay.

programme.title: Poisoning The Well
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E07, While on the planet Hoff, Dr. Beckett strives to help the Hoffans who are working on a vaccine against the Wraith. Despite the advice against taking the vaccine due to the threat of violence and high death rate, the Hoffans take the risk.

programme.title: Underground
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E08, The team visit the Genii, a peaceful farming community, with the goal of trading for food to allow the team to continue to survive. Things take a turn, however when they discover that the Genii are planning a massive attack against the Wraith.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E09, Upon arriving at a new planet, M5S-224, the team discovers that they can gate back to Earth. The team sets out, with the intention of returning thanks to a new hyperdrive. But when the engines suddenly explode, the team deals with a new situation.

programme.title: The Storm
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E10, Sheppard and Teyla discover that a massive storm is approaching the city. The team must evacuate the city, and the Manarians offer to give them shelter. As they work to figure out a way to power up the shield, the city is invaded by the Genii.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E09, Using the communications stones, Lt. Scott and Camile Wray use their time back on Earth to visit those they’ve left behind. Aboard Destiny, the crew stumbles upon a piece of Ancient technology that carries the promise of a way home.

programme.title: Justice
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E10, Everyone is shocked when a member of the crew is found dead from a gunshot wound. While it appears to be suicide, the gun is nowhere to be found…until it shows up in Col. Young’s (Louis Ferreira) quarters and he becomes the number one suspect.

programme.title: Space
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E11, An alien vessel appears in Destiny’s path and launches an attack, capturing Chloe. Col. Young must use the stones again to get aboard the ship and try to rescue Chloe. He quickly realizes, however, that Chloe isn’t the only prisoner aboard.

programme.title: Divided
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E12, Suspecting an alien tracking device may be hidden somewhere aboard the Destiny, Col. Young and Lt. Scott search the ship’s hull. While distracted by the search, a group aboard the Destiny puts in action a coup that has life-threatening consequences.

programme.title: Avenger 2.0
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E09, Dr. Felger creates a computer virus meant to disable Goa'uld-controlled worlds. When the program malfunctions and spreads throughout the Stargate network, O'Neill, Teal'c and Daniel are trapped off-world, with danger looming around the corner.

programme.title: Birthright
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E10, SG-1 encounters a race of women warriors whose survival depends on symbiotes harvested from Jaffa. Teal'c and SG-1 must convince the warriors' high priestess to put aside her fear of reliance on a life-saving drug before the Goa'uld destroy them.

programme.title: Evolution (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E11, SG-1 encounters a very advanced bio-engineered warrior endowed with super strength, created by Anubis. While the team sets out to locate the origin of this new foe, Daniel travels to South America in search of a device left on Earth by the Ancients.

programme.title: Evolution (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E12, Having found the location of the warrior base, Carter is assigned a recon mission to determine Anubis's plans. Meanwhile, O'Neill mounts a mission to South America to rescue Daniel who has been kidnapped by Honduran rebels demanding a ransom.

programme.title: Grace
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E13, Having sustained an injury during an alien attack, Carter awakens to find herself abandoned on the Prometheus and trapped. With only her subconscious as a guide, Carter must find a way out of the nebula before it destroys the ship and her way home.

programme.title: Fallout
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E14, Jonas Quinn returns to the SGC with news that Naquadria mines of Kelowna are not native to his world and are threatening to cause an explosion in the planet's core that will leave his home world uninhabitable and millions dead.

programme.title: A Fine Mess
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E04, Steve buys an engagement ring and practices proposals, often with Noah assuming the role of Janet. Dylan grows tired of living with Gina and suggests that she find her own place. David's radio show becomes popular due to his abrasive tactics.

programme.title: The Loo-Ouch
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E05, Steve and Janet announce the pregnancy and engagement to her parents, who respond by calling Janet a disgrace. Matt and Noah each offer to move out so that Steve can move Janet and the baby into the house.

programme.title: 80's Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E06, David's radio persona gets flack-and ratings; Matt tries to overturn a death sentence for a rapist-murderer; the after-hours club attracts the wrong attention; Steve haunts the house.

programme.title: Baby, You Can Drive My Car
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E08, Janet begins to panic about wedding preparations. Steve suggests that they organize a scavenger hunt for their friends, with clues providing the location of a party. Gina freaks out when Dylan refuses to pull over and help a stray dog.

programme.title: Family Tree
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E09, Steve and Janet endure various calamaties on their honeymoon. Just as they are beginning to have a good time, Janet goes into labor. Jackie seeks full custody of Erin, and David and Kelly try to keep their sister's spirits up.

programme.title: Nine Yolks Whipped Lightly
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E12, Gina's meeting with her father is unsatisfying, similar to Janet and her parents; Donna can't let go of Noah's accident; Dylan loses control in front of kids, and has second thoughts about Kelly, but is too late.

programme.title: I'm Using You 'Cause I Like You
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E14, Donna and David meet promising new mates; Kelly decides to quit the store; Matt violates his suspension; Dylan suffers from fast-lane acquaintances; the Sanders' hire a nanny.

programme.title: The Final Proof
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E16, Dylan accedes to Shane's demands for Noah; Kelly and Matt prepare to go on a couples game show; Dr. Martin tries to bond with Gina.

programme.title: Eddie Waitkus
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E18, A news report shows a live dead-ringer for Dylan's late father; Noah intrudes on Donna's meeting someone new; Kelly compromises her personal feelings for her profession; David gets the wrong idea when he overhears Camille talking with friends.

programme.title: Ever Heard the One About the Exploding Father?
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E20, Dylan's father makes him an offer; Steve lobbies for Ryan's return to college; David interviews for a job in New York; Matt represents a stand-up comic fired for not being funny.

programme.title: The Easter Bunny
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E22, Kelly grows suspicious of Matt's distant behavior. Camille tries to convince Donna to sell her clothing online. Steve and Janet fear that her parents' dog is to blame for the death of their snooty neighbors' pet rabbit.

programme.title: And Don't Forget to Give Me Back My Black T-Shirt
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E23, Mitch annoys Donna by trying to plan their entire relationship via an electronic organizer. Janet nixes Steve's plans to invest in Donna's site because of their limited finances.

programme.title: Love Is Blind
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E24, Dylan's generous wedding gift vexes Kelly and Matt, who consider moving to Seattle; an offer for their tabloid separates the Sanders' professionally; Noah meets Ellen's family; Donna's mother sells her house.

programme.title: The Penultimate
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E26, David expresses his feelings for Donna by writing her a giant love note in the sand. Dylan graduates from California University. Matt considers moving to New York to help his sister-in-law raise her child.

programme.title: Ode to Joy
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E27, After 10 years, the friends of 90210 say goodbye with a wedding, a reunion, and a few surprises! Just as Donna and David are joining together, Kelly's life is falling apart. Meanwhile, Steve and Janet make some major decisions about their future.

programme.title: Pilot Parts 1 and 2
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E001, Twins Brandon and Brenda Walsh experience a very special kind of culture shock when they move from Minnesota to Beverly Hills and begin their new lives at West Beverly High.

programme.title: Let the Games Begin
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E08, Australia's Uncle Toby's International Ironman Competition comes to LA. The Baywatch girls think all is fair in sports and convince the guys that they should compete as equals, setting the stage for a series of pranks between the men and women.

programme.title: Buried
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E09, Controversy generated by Donna's appearance in Playboy magazine divides the Baywatch lifeguards. When an earthquake triggers a rockslide, burying a bus full of junior lifeguards, Mitch, Samantha, Cody and Donna try to rescue them.

programme.title: Search and Rescue
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E10, After rescuing a group of fishermen and tourists from a pier fire, Samantha and L.A. fire chief Captain Huntingdon form an elite joint Search and Rescue unit. Meanwhile, Cody asks CJ to paint his portrait, and Mitch receives some strange PI work.

programme.title: Heal the Bay
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E11, Donna and Caroline work with Heal the Bay after a recent rainstorm washes inland pollutants into the waters off Santa Monica. Mitch falls ill after he unknowing swims over sunken drums of toxic chemicals.

programme.title: Bachlor of the Month
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E12, Mitch has been chosen Flash Magazine's Bachelor of the Month, a designation that leads to wild complications. Stephanie is making plans for her wedding to Tom, but her sister Caroline keeps getting in the way.

programme.title: Chance of a Lifetime
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E13, Stephanie and Tom go on their honeymoon in a two-mast schooner with a group of troubled teenagers, with Mitch and Neely along for help. All is going well until they get trapped in a hurricane and the ship starts sinking!

programme.title: Talk Show
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E14, Mitch gets his “15 minutes of fame” when he rescues Jay Leno from choking, and a female talk show host from drowning. Caroline and CJ adopt a stray dog swimming in the ocean that mystically reminds them of Stephanie.

programme.title: Life Guardian
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E15, After Caroline, Neely and Manny rescue three orphan teenage boys from drowning, Caroline seeks out the enigmatic, mysterious youth who helped her rescue one of the boys. Neely's ex-husband returns, complicating her life.

programme.title: Matters of the Heart
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E16, Manny is haunted by his past when two juvenile delinquents from his home borough in East LA arrive at Baywatch for community service. Meanwhile, Neely suspects Mitch and Samantha are becoming more than coworkers.

programme.title: Rendezvous
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E17, When a young couple’s romance is threatened by their parents, they make a pact to end their lives together rather than end their romance. Meanwhile, Cody encounters a mermaid while diving, and of course no one believes him… except CJ.

programme.title: Hot Water
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E18, While testing new scuba diving technology, Sam, Neely and Caroline witness a jet crash. They rescue the pilot, who reveals that he was transporting a canister that contains a deadly virus. Meanwhile, the team must shut down an illegal nude beach.

programme.title: Baywatch at Sea World
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E19, Caroline finds herself being sued for negligence in civil court by the angry and bitter mother of a drowning victim. CJ babysits a neighbor’s newborn and realizes she wants to be a mother. But is Cody ready to be a father?

programme.title: Trial by Fire
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E20, CJ and Cody transport an injured sea lion to the animal recovery facility at Sea World. While there, Samantha gets the idea to promote lifeguarding by planning a Baywatch-theme stunt show at Sea World.

programme.title: Golden Girls
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E21, A crazed young woman is causing trouble on the Venice Boardwalk and Neely suspects it is more than meets the eye. Meanwhile, Newman meets his dream woman – who doesn’t speak English.

programme.title: Nevermore
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E22, A mysterious, disfigured man whom the public dubs "the phantom lifeguard," is secretly saving people and sending love notes to CJ. When CJ goes missing the team sets out to find her and the “phantom.”

programme.title: Rookie Summer
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E01, Young, ambitious and sexy lifeguard candidates compete for a chance to attend Rookie School. Mitch is offered a promotion to Captain and has a tough decision to make. Lani McKensie faces the sinister return of a former lover.

programme.title: Next Generation
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E02, Hobie, Lani, April, and Skylar are among the trainees competing for a few open slots as Baywatch Lifeguards. Hobie isn't sure he wants to follow in his father's footsteps, but when a vengeful jet skier comes after April, Hobie comes to her rescue.
